code: const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE||'http://localhost:5000/api';export async function fetchAbout(){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/about"));return res.json();}export async function fetchPizzas(){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/pizzas"));return res.json();}export async function placeOrder(order){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/orders"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(order)});return res.json();}export async function submitContact(contact){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/contacts"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(contact)});return res.json();}
